targets.query: SELECT "NH3", "H2S", "HF", "HCl" FROM "crds" WHERE ("valve_pos" =~ /^$valve_pos$/ AND "valve_settle_time" > 15) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 100
SELECT "NH3", "H2S", "HF", "HCl" FROM "crds" WHERE ("valve_pos" =~ /^$valve_pos$/ AND "valve_settle_time" > 15) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 100
